description:
Lets the user select which print settings are available on the Materials pane of the preferences.

This plugin does not change the fact that a setting value specified in the 'sidebar' settings, or in a quality profile, always overrides the value set for the material.

The development of this plugin can be sponsored via Github Sponsors (https://github.com/sponsors/fieldofview) or Paypal (https://www.paypal.me/fieldofview)
